SapRfcMetaData.Description: Execute external Commit when using BAPIs

ActivityConstraintBase.Description: To run the SAP activity step, provide a value for the Server field in the Property Sheet.
To run the SAP activity step, provide a value for the System Number field in the Property Sheet.
To run the SAP activity step, provide a value for the Client field in the Property Sheet.
To run the SAP activity step, provide a value for the Username field in the Property Sheet.

GeneralProperties.name: GeneralProperties
GeneralProperties.SectionSchema: <Section name="GeneralProperties" source="true" isSharedMetaData="true" displayName="General properties"><xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:types="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0"><xs:import namespace="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0" schemaLocation="..\..\..\dat\schemas\Types.xsd" /><xs:element name="Arguments" types:displayName="Properties"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="StepId" type="xs:string" types:readonly="true" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Step Id" /><xs:element name="Name" default="BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT" type="xs:string" types:destination="false" types:displayName="Name" /><xs:element name="FunctionName" types:readonly="true" default="BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT" type="xs:string" types:argType="xml" types:configurable="true" types:displayName="Function name" /><xs:element name="Timeout" types:displayName="Timeout" type="xs:int" default="100000"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Time for performing RFC in ms</xs:documentation></xs:annotation></xs:element><xs:element name="ExpectException" type="xs:boolean" types:displayName="Expect Exception" types:configurable="false" /><xs:element name="ConnectionInfo"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Server" type="xs:string" default="10.0.16.14" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Server" /><xs:element name="SystemNumber" type="xs:string" default="00" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="System number" /><xs:element name="Client" type="xs:string" default="800" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Client" /><xs:element name="Username" type="xs:string" default="testuser" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Username" /><xs:element name="Password" type="xs:string" default="UNrrTkMjzFU310JjDiPgdw==" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Password" types:masked="true" /></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element><xs:element name="UseTransaction" types:displayName="Transaction" type="xs:boolean" types:visible="true" types:source="true"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Transaction</xs:documentation></xs:annotation></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema></Section>

InputProperties.name: InputProperties
InputProperties.SectionSchema: <Section name="InputProperties" source="true" dest="true" propertiesType="XML" showXmlControls="true" isSharedMetaData="true" displayName="Import"><xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><xs:import schemaLocation="..\..\..\dat\schemas\Types.xsd" namespace="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0" /><xs:element name="Request"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Imports"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element minOccurs="0" name="WAIT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Using the command `COMMIT AND WAIT` The string must be a single character.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="1" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema></Section>

OutputProperties.name: OutputProperties
OutputProperties.SectionSchema: <Section name="OutputProperties" source="true" dest="true" checkPoint="true" propertiesType="XML" showXmlControls="true" isSharedMetaData="true" arrayCheckPoint="true" displayName="Export"><xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><xs:import schemaLocation="..\..\..\dat\schemas\Types.xsd" namespace="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0" /><xs:element name="Response"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Exports"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element minOccurs="1" name="RETURN"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Return Messages</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="TYPE"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message type: S Success, E Error, W Warning, I Info, A Abort The string must be a single character.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="1" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="ID"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message Class The string cannot exceed 20 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="20" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="NUMBER"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message Number The integer cannot exceed 3 digits.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction xmlns:q1="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0" base="q1:numc"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MESSAGE"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message Text The string cannot exceed 220 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="220" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="LOG_NO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Application log: log number The string cannot exceed 20 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="20" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="LOG_MSG_NO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Application log: Internal message serial number The integer cannot exceed 6 digits.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction xmlns:q2="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0" base="q2:numc"><xs:maxLength value="6" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MESSAGE_V1"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message Variable The string cannot exceed 50 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="50" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MESSAGE_V2"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message Variable The string cannot exceed 50 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="50" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MESSAGE_V3"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message Variable The string cannot exceed 50 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="50" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MESSAGE_V4"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message Variable The string cannot exceed 50 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="50" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="PARAMETER"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Parameter Name The string cannot exceed 32 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="32" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="ROW"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Lines in parameter The integer value cannot exceed 2147483647.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:int" /></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="FIELD"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Field in parameter The string cannot exceed 30 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="30" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="SYSTEM"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Logical system from which message originates The string cannot exceed 10 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="10" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema></Section>
